# style

**Instance Property**

The basic appearance of the activity indicator.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var style: UIActivityIndicatorView.Style { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityIndicatorView/Style-swift.enum] for the available styles. The default value is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityIndicatorView/Style-swift.enum/medium].

## Configuring the activity indicator appearance

- **color**: The color of the activity indicator.
